Worst game you can buy on Steam. Besides this trashy steamkey games this is the really last shit you should buy on steam. Next to many bugs and underpowered survivors playing versus overpowered killers is not the only guaranteed fun in this game. You will meet the unbelivable community of dbd only while spamming with your flashlight or facecamping your opponents. The game is the great silver rusty dustbin and the community is the trash in it. Seriously, don't buy this. Waste your 20 $ on weed or some less useless stuff like this.

O jogo em si é bom, além de divertido, está sempre com novos conteúdos e personagens.
Mas o sistema de encontrar partida deles é péssimo, tem bugs, mta gente reclamando no forum deles sobre "desconectado do host" e eles fazem nada sobre, e tem muitas pessoas que não conseguem achar ou demora 15min-30min como killer.
Se for jogar só como sobrevivente rola, mas ainda vai cair algumas vezes e vc vai subir de rank como se tivesse sido culpa sua e você mesmo desconectado!

The game has gotten so stupid with penalty for individuals who get disconnected or quit... So now killers just camp on the hooks. What a piss poor feature. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME UNTIL THIS FEATURE HAS BEEN FIXED - 99% of penalty comes from disconnect or even better piss poor technical failures to their game.

Officially uninstalled after new killer was released - incredibly over powered, zero balance. Good luck!

Mano, pra começar, vai toma no meio do cu.

Se você gosta desse jogo, não tenho nada contra você, seja feliz.

Mas tenho muita coisa contra esse jogo, sinto que perdi horas e horas do meu tempo nesse monte de lixo imundo.

Jogo completamente quebrado, cheio de bug, lag e os desenvolvedores não tem a minima intenção de arrumar, ainda fazem live falando que esses bugs são uma forma de equilibrar o jogo e etc.

Resumindo, jogo ridículo, não vale 2 reais com todas as DLC's, na verdade ainda ta muito caro. 

Não compre se vc dá valor a sua vida. Tem jogos muito melhores de graça.

If you enjoyed playing hide'nseek as a kid you'll enjoy this game. Some killers are annoying to play against, but every survivor can evade them effectively if they do a lot of turns around obstacles. Game does get monotonous if the survivor chooses to run in circles or the killer camps hooks. But usually its a fun game of chase and be chased.

To begin with i'd 100% say to get Dead by Daylight, it's a game that plays so differently to others these days and it's generally really enjoyable, however there are a few things that are... wrong? with the game in my opinion or just the community in general.
- As an asymmetrical "horror" game it's hard to have balanced, which leads to a lot of frustration in game towards certain aspects.
- The devs do listen to feed back and try to fix bugs as soon as they can, but there have been bugs upon bugs that either haven't been fixed or have taken such a long time to be fixed.
- The game is VERY repetitive in some aspects.

Now like i said previously i totally recommend this game, it would be great to get more and more players, especially in AU regions, just feel that if you're going to get this game, or looking in to it.. do some research first, or go in with an open mind and not get pissed and uninstall 1 match in :)
Very good choice!

I definitely recommend this game. It's spooky, scary, terrifying all those wonderful adjectives. It's better to queue up with a bunch of buddies and cooperate with each other to try and escape. But on the other hand it's even more fun to try and kill all of them with the variety of killers the game has (my favorite being Michael Myers.) This game has been rather slow as of lately, I queued up for a killer match for about 20 minutes, got in, and then the server disconnected and I received a 5 minute temp ban... so it kinda put me off. But I'm going to be returning to give it another shot.

A very fun game but the community is toxic as hell, if you are fine with that you should buy it because it is fun!  When you are survivor you repair 5 generators or find the hatch and escape through there when a designated number of survivors are dead. There are 4 survivors in total, they can bring items into a match or find items within the matches. These items are as follows:

Item rarity from common to epic, there's also event items. The items are either Toolboxes, Medkits,  Flashlights, Maps, or Keys, In certain events too fire crackers are present. The Toolboxes repair gens and destroy hooks. Medkits can heal you and other teammates faster. Flashlights can blind the killer and make him drop a survivor or just make him blind. Maps reveal the locations of things like Generators. Keys make it so you can escape through the hatch. You can also see survivors aura and killers as well when you equip certain addons.

The killer must hook survivors on hooks, or he could kill them with certain items. There are 2 stages of hooked survivor. The first stage is the stage where they wiggle their arms around and can try to escape, if they try to escape the hook kill them faster and they go into stage 2. Stage 2 is a stage where they must repeatedly tap space to not die. Remember that other survivors can unhook them, you must hook them 3 times if they are saved from every stage, 3 hooks automatically means death for the survivor.

There are an arsenal of killers and survivors we will start with the killers.

There are 22 killers in all. All of them if not most of them play with a different play style. There are licensed killers such as:

Michael Myers, Bubba Sawyer (Texas Chainsaw Massacre), Freddy Krueger, Amanda Young (The Pig from Saw) , Danny Jhonson (GhostFace), Demogorgon, Pyramid Head. Those are some licensed killers out of the way! You should look up how each of these killers play! 

Now for the survivors, there are 24 survivors in all, they all have different perks. Here are some Licensed Survivors.

Laurie Strode (Halloween), Willam "Bill" Overbeck (Left 4 Dead), Quentin Smith (Nightmare on Elmstreet),  David Tapp (Saw),  Ash J. Willams (The Evil Dead), Nancy Wheeler ( Stranger Things), Steve Harrington (Stranger Things), Cheryl Mason (Silent Hill).

Thats all of the Licensed characters. There  is probably even more coming!

In general I give this game a 7/10. It was fun when I played it but there are a ton of glitches and imbalances that exist within the game. The new killer was even broken for a while.

Edit: the games updating system is bs. Every time I wanna install an update it just tries to verify.

This still holds up 200 hours later.

Echt ein Unbalanciertes Party Game im großen und Ganzen.
Die Entwickler verstehen ihr eigenes Spiel nicht und kümmern sich 0 um das Game, und hören nur auf die Nullen in den Game, und bei der Kleinsten Kritik im Forum wird man sofort gebannt sowie für Reporten eines Cheaters weil man "Ihnen ja keine Aufmerksamkeit geben möchte" Ganz toll. Report System ingame funkt Nicht, genau so wie das Anti Cheat Programm. Maps einfach ohne Jegliche Rücksicht auf Größe, Struktur, und Fairness für Killer Rein gehauen genau wie Manche Perks die Einfach Unbalanciert und Unfair sind. Spieler meistens nur Minus menschen die einen den Tag versauen wollen. MMR System Total Durcheinander und dumm Gestaltet. Bug und Glitches sind Alltag, Dieses spiel treibt einen Wirklich zum Nerven Zusammenbruch. Noch nie so Inkompetente Devs gesehen. Mich würde echt nicht wundern Wenn die Devs die Cheats noch Verkaufen Würden. Fragt jeden die Ahnung haben Jeder wird Das gleiche über das spiel sagen.
